ygData.subject: Re: Stats for a char
ygData.msgSnippet: Also remember that there are many stat changing pieces of equipment available. So any place you feel you might be lacking, odds are there is a piece that will
ygData.messageBody:
Also remember that there are many stat changing
pieces of equipment available. So any place you feel you
might be lacking, odds are there is a piece that will
assist you. I play a wide(ish) variety of toons. Kind
of. I don't seem to play pure casters that
well.<br><br>Currently (on one server) I have the
following:<br><br>Halfling Druid - lvl 31<br>Wood Elf Warrior - lvl
27<br>Wood Elf Bard - lvl 22<br>Dark Elf Rogue - lvl
18<br>High Elf Paladin - lvl 16<br>Vah Shir Bard - lvl 13
(full faydark ringmail looks stunning on a white
tiger)<br>Half Elf Warrior - lvl 10 (he's been reassigned the
role of banker/warehouse)<br><br>Timmye
Cousteau<br>The Rathe
